document_name: Decree No. 100-318 of 22 December 2011 on the statutes of the Burundian agency for rural electrification (ABER)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/BDI/2011/BDI-2011-12-22-Decree No. 100-318 of 22 December 2011 on the statutes of the Burundian agency for rural electrification (ABER)_71f6ce7031a8c06f4d80e09b1c875dab.pdf
document_description: This decree defines the status, attributions and missions of the Burundian agency for rural electrification. Art. 3 states that The Agency's mission is the development and implementation of rural electrification programs and projects, including mini-hydro, solar and wind energy, and any other forms of energy that can be used to generate electricity. provide to the rural population.
